actions.committee: Senate Committee on Rules and Administration
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Rules and Administration.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on Rules and Administration, S. Rept. 93-698.

official_title: Resolves, that the Committee on Government Operations is authorized to expend from the contingent fund of the Senate, during the Ninety-third Congress, $10,000 in addition to the amount, and for the same purposes, specified in section 134(a) of the Legislative Reorganization Act of 1946.

summary.text: Authorizes the Senate Committee on Government Operations to expend from the contingent fund of the Senate, during the Ninety-third Congress, $10,000 in addition to the amount, and for the same purposes, specified in the Legislative Reorganization Act of 1946.

titles.title: Resolves, that the Committee on Government Operations is authorized to expend from the contingent fund of the Senate, during the Ninety-third Congress, $10,000 in addition to the amount, and for the same purposes, specified in section 134(a) of the Legislative Reorganization Act of 1946.
